plot: A little girl, working in a harbor tavern, dreams of becoming one of the infamous Sea Bandits. She sets off on an adventure.
title: Flickan & Sirenen
plot_es: A little girl, working in a harbor tavern, dreams of becoming one of the infamous Sea Bandits. She sets off on an adventure.
plot_en: A little girl, working in a harbor tavern, dreams of becoming one of the infamous Sea Bandits. She sets off on an adventure.
